p: We then generated alignments between the genome sequence of strain BJDX-01-2015 and those of strains HAdV-B55, HAdV-B11, and HAdV-B14. Most of the nucleotide differences in BJDX-01-2015 relative to HAdV-B/CHN/BJ01/2011/55 (GenBank accession number JX491639) were observed in the coding region of protein VI (Fig. 4a), where we found seven nucleotide changes and six amino acid substitutions. We also found different numbers of poly “T” and ploy “A” tracts (Fig. 4b).
